EmailTemplate.subject: Bigger Savings for MRO
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
At GoDirect Trade, we are committed to providing you the parts you need to continue running your operations safely and with zero interruptions. We lists all parts at the best prices, leaving you more time to focus on your business.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Bigger_Savings_for_MRO.html]]> to access the price list in excel format so you can quickly find the parts you need at discounted prices and fill your shelves. Use promo code SAVEBIG at checkout for an extra 50% off.
Go ahead, click on the link and start buying online today! SHOP PRODUCTS FOR REPAIR <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/discount.html]]> Stay safe, stay healthy and take care,Lisa ButtersGeneral ManagerGoDirectTrade.com <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Email&utm_campaign=Seller_Wizard]]> (powered by Honeywell)
